The image was published on Facebook on A: 2019, and has been shared more than 300 times.
The image shows Philippine Senator Juan: Sonny" Angara pointing at the sleeve of fellow Senator Vicente "Tito" Sotto III.
The original image posted by Angara on h: 2019, does not have the word "DIRETSO!" on Sotto's sleeve.
